title: Oracle’s stumble hits AI trade, but many remain bullish
description: The red-hot trade backing artificial intelligence-related stocks has taken a bruising from a disappointing report from Oracle, reigniting concerns about frothy valuations and an AI bubble. Still, investors say reasons for optimism about AI remain intact, and many are wary about calling a top. Investors have piled into AI-related companies this year as the technology [...]

title: American Workers Quietly Spark a $420 Billion AI Productivity Boost
description: New survey findings from Recon Analytics reveal a profound shift underway in the American workplace. AI adoption is spreading through individual choice far more than through corporate mandates. According to data collected from over 100,000 professionals, with 95 percent confidence and an error rate of 2.6 percent, workers are turning to AI tools because they [...]The post American Workers Quietly Spark a $420 Billion AI Productivity Boost appeared first on TechBullion.

title: Fox Host Defends AI Data Center Needs Over Christmas Tree Farm: ‘Get On Board'
description: "The Big Money Show" co-host Dagen McDowell said Maryland residents should "buy a fake tree" and let a proposed energy project ruin a local farm.
